summary: Invoice app with updated pricing plans: Free plan includes 10 invoices/month; Pro plan costs Rs 299 with unlimited invoices.

existing_features.title: Update all user-facing pricing/plan copy to state that the Free plan includes **10 invoices per month** (replace any existing '5 invoices per month' references). Ensure this is reflected consistently on the Pricing page and Landing page.
Update any dashboard plan-limit messaging that references the Free plan monthly invoice limit so it aligns with **10 invoices per month**.
Confirm Pro plan pricing and invoice entitlement are consistent across the app: **₹299/month** and **Unlimited invoices** wherever Pro plan pricing/features are displayed.

new_feature_requests.summary: Update pricing plans: Free includes 10 invoices/month; Pro is Rs 299 with unlimited invoices

projectName: Update pricing copy: Free includes 10 invoices/month and Pro is ₹299 with unlimited invoices
